short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Offers an immersive experience with a Kungfu Panda Background.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Each time you open a new tab, you'll be greeted with vivid images of Po and his team, along with handy features like a real-time clock, enhanced search bar, and shortcuts to your favorite websites. The extension also allows for customizable backgrounds featuring Kungfu Panda themes, enabling you to switch between light or dark modes according to your personal preference.

Key features:
- Beautiful background.
- Quick access to frequently visited sites.
- Customizable search bar and shortcuts.
- Timer and Calculator Features
- New RSS
